participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I'm an avid reader who enjoys reading books that motivate me to achieve my goals. I like bagels with everything on them. My favorite phone is an iPhone. My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love. I love adventure; that is why I have been a salesperson all my life.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: My social media presence is part of my job, so I try to keep it up-to-date and interesting. I enjoy my family and do not care about socializing. Last month the farm was foreclosed, so I'm looking for a new job. I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues. I like to bake brownies.

content.text: I love reading! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read books about self-improvement and motivation. I also like to read biographies.
Me too! I'm always looking for ways to improve myself and grow as a person.
I love that! I think it's so important to be constantly learning and growing.
I agree! It's the best way to live your life to the fullest.
I'm glad you agree! What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Power of Habit" by Charles Duhigg. It's really interesting!
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great read.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a sales person. I love it! I get to meet new people and learn about different businesses.
That sounds exciting! I'm a baker. I love baking brownies.
Oh my gosh! I love brownies! What's your favorite kind?
I like to make them with chocolate chips and walnuts.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to come over for a brownie tasting sometime!
You're welcome to come over anytime! I'll make sure to have some brownies ready for you.
